dcterms:creator: R. Lowe
Y. Wu
A. Tamar
J. Harb
O. P. Abbeel
I. Mordatch
dcterms:description: N slower cooperating agents (predators) must chase the faster adversary (prey) around an environment with L large landmarks in randomly-generated locations. The predators get a reward when they catch (touch) the prey while the prey is penalized. The team reward for the predators is the cumulative number of prey-touches in an episode.
dcterms:title: Predator-Prey

dcterms:creator: A. Rahmattalabi
J. J. Chung
M. Colby
K. Tumer
dcterms:description: N agents cooperate to reach a single target Point of Interest (POI) among N POIs. They are rewarded based on the closest distance of any agent to the target. A lone adversary also desires to reach the target POI, but does not know which of the POIs is the correct one.
dcterms:title: Physical Deception

dcterms:creator: A. Rahmattalabi
J. J. Chung
M. Colby
K. Tumer
dcterms:description: A team of N cooperating agents must reach a target POI out of L total POIs. Each agent is rewarded based on its distance to the target. An adversary also has to occupy the target while keeping the cooperating agents from reaching it.
dcterms:title: Keep-Away

dcterms:creator: A. Rahmattalabi
J. J. Chung
M. Colby
K. Tumer
dcterms:description: N agents must cooperate to reach a set of K POIs. Multiple agents need to simultaneously go to the same POI in order to observe it. The teamâ€™s reward is the percentage of POIs observed at the end of an episode.
dcterms:title: Rover Domain
